snippet: Britain’s annual rate of consumer price inflation rose to 0.3 percent in January from 0.2 percent in December, the Office of National Statistics said.
abstract: Britain's Office of National Statistics reports January's annual rate of consumer price inflation rose to 0.3 percent, its highest level in a year; figure is still low enough to prevent interest rate hike.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s annual rate of consumer price inflation rose to 0.3 percent in January from 0.2 percent in December, the Office of National Statistics said.

headline.print_headline: British Consumer Inflation Inched Up to 0.3% in January
headline.main: British Consumer Inflation Inched Up 0.3% in January
